name: until the ship hits the dock
name_original: until the ship hits the dock
description:
to collect resources you need to have your cursor hover over either

the ship;for knowledge

the wood stack:for wood

the bush;for thatch

the rocks:for rocks

to get one of the charaters to move there you need to press either 1,2,3,4 or 5 to get one of your people to move over there and collect resources

every boat upgrade makes the wood/knowledge cost go up by one hundred (i will update this soon to just show the cost but i didnt have the time to add it)

everything else costs 100 hundred of everything 

to move around the bottom menu you use the arrow keys and space to select/upgrade stuff

ill finish setting this up once the jams over because i feel bad having them submit this when i was late ;-;

pressing the key when its green doesnt work atm saddly soooo yeah ;-;a
